entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023
